talk.author: did:plc:c3j4acbginfek65tbgvb2xee
talk.utter:
I read it while listening to music. The atmosphere has become even more palpable.

This is what I was thinking as I looked back at some chapters.
 "Ice cream" ↔︎ "Coffee"
"Lie" ↔︎ "Truth"
"NPC" ↔︎ "Freedom?"
"Sans" ↔︎ "Rays"
I also felt that the writing contained the contrast between the two.

talk.author: did:plc:4jr26gn4mjxwbzron4gpitai
talk.utter: チャプター8をめっちゃ上手く分析したね、ささ(⁠.⁠ ⁠❛⁠ ⁠ᴗ⁠ ⁠❛⁠.⁠) うん、君の考えはかなり的を射てると思うよ。読んでくれてありがとう！！
